review: I just won this chromecast on a contest.  I received it and hooked it up, set up was going well and then it would not connect to my router.  It gives you directions on how to adjust a setting on your router to get around this. I spent a few hours trying to figure it out, and then I seen a link that said not all routers are compatible.  I click that and checked and mine was not it gives me directions on how to contact the router company, but I have not got a hold of them yet.  My router is a Actiontec PK5000,  I still might get it to work but not real hopeful.If you now how to help me please feel free,  thank you!!!!
author: Amazon Customer

review: That pretty much sums it up.  I bought this primarily because I wanted to be able to switch from DVD Netflix to online Netflix.  Thus far, it works like a charm.  Obviously, if your internet has too big of a hiccup, you're hosed.  But, that's only happened once.  We use it primarily with our iPad as the controller.  I've used Pandora a few times as well, which works well too.  Wish it had a few more apps that were compatible.  (Spotify would be awesome...) But, definitely $35 well spent.
author: Sean R. Wise "Turtle441"

review: Inexpensive way to stream content from a PC or laptop to your TV (provided you have a free HDMI input).  Set up on my laptop with no problems but, for some reason, didn't want to complete installation on my wife's laptop until I deleted Chrome and re-installed it.  Very happy not to have HMDI cable stretching across the living room for someone to trip on.
author: Robert C. Sawyer

review: It was easy to set up and casting with it is a breeze. Hit that cast button and within second or so, what you want to watch is right on your screen. I was a little wary when I got it, because I heard that some routers were not compatible, or that you needed to have a strong wifi connection for it to work reliably, but I didn't experience any of those problems. I haven't had any problems with it all being slow, dropping connections or anything. Even tab casting with it has been pretty enjoyable experience. This bad boy is definitely worth the $30 spent on it. I would strongly recommend this to anyone, especially if they like to stream movies or tv shows but have no easily accessible way to get them onto their tv, except through hdmi cords and adapters, which can be a hassle.
author: H. Parker
